definition: to work/to operate/to revolve/to turn around
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
the time comes, fortune turns (idiom); to have a lucky break/things change for the better

sentences.english: The result of running-in indicates that the refitting project is feasible.
sentences.chinese: 試運轉及裝車路試說明，改裝設計方案是可行的。

sentences.english: That is what revs his engine.
sentences.chinese: 這才能使他的發動機運轉。

sentences.english: The range fan needs a lot of power to run.
sentences.chinese: 抽油煙機需要很大的功率來運轉。

sentences.english: To ensure the hotel equipments operation normally and safety.
sentences.chinese: 確保酒店設備安全並正常運轉。

sentences.english: At present, Otis is operating in more than 200 ries and regions.
sentences.chinese: 目前，奧的斯電梯在200多個國家和地區運轉着。

sentences.english: But rather nature has been a sense set it into motion.
sentences.chinese: 自然已經是開始運轉了的。

sentences.english: Ocean waves move the hydraulic fluid, which spins the generator.
sentences.chinese: 海浪推動液壓油從而驅動發電機運轉。

sentences.english: Predictability is the ability of a machine to behave as expected.
sentences.chinese: 可預測性是機器按照期望的那樣來運轉的能力。

sentences.english: BesGas Three has remained in operation for decades since.
sentences.chinese: 此後，貝斯平第三氣體精煉廠持續運轉了幾十年。

sentences.english: The system is running smoothly with large through-put volume, easy to operate.
sentences.chinese: 人員通過量高，機械運轉平穩。

sentences.english: Ensure that the grille is in place while the machinery is in operation.
sentences.chinese: 機器運轉時一定要放好安全網罩。

sentences.english: Delivers you a peach blossom, a change inone's fortune from bad to good depends entirely on it.
sentences.chinese: 送你一隻桃花，時來運轉全靠它。

sentences.english: The churn revolved as usual, but the butter would not come.
sentences.chinese: 攪黃油的機器照常運轉着，但是黃油就是攪不出來。

sentences.english: Once the flow of water stops or even slows down, the water mill, that is the economy, will stop moving.
sentences.chinese: 一旦水流減慢或停止，水磨坊，即經濟將停止運轉。

sentences.english: Adjustable relief valve, may be caused by non normal operation of hydraulic system.
sentences.chinese: 任意調整溢流閥後，可能會造成液壓系統非正常運轉。

definition: to move along one's course (of celestial bodies etc)/(fig.) to function/to be in operation/(of a train service etc) to operate/to run/(of a computer) to run
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to drive/to propel/drive (vehicle wheel)/drive mechanism (tape or disk)/device driver (computing software)
track (for trains etc)/orbit (of a satellite)/(fig.) a person's established path in life/desired trajectory (of a business or other endeavor)/(audio engineering) track/(quantum mechanics) orbital
(of Taoists) to practice austerities/to practice asceticism
to achieve/to implement/to realize/to bring about
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
